detail_desc: Bracelet in imitation leather with metal details and a magnetic metal fastener.

Short, A-line dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and gathered seams at the waist and hem creating tiers for added width. Sleeveless jersey underdress.
Ballet pumps in glittery imitation leather with a scalloped top edge and loop at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neckline with a ribbed trim.
Wide, high-waisted trousers in an airy rib knit with a visible zip at the top and straight, wide legs with a seam at the hem.
Set with a top and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. Top with a print motif and appliqués on the front and flutter sleeves. Shorts with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
Parka in a woven modal blend with a soft, brushed finish. Hood, zip down the front, side pockets and a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
Short blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, buttons at the back of the neck, an open back with ties at the hem, and long puff sleeves with smocking at the cuffs.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.

Double-breasted coat in a felted weave with an appliqué on one sleeve, notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, side pockets and a single back vent. Lined. The coat can be converted into a short jacket by opening a visible zip at the waist.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit with a roll-edge neckline, long sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Short, round-necked dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide flounce at the cuffs. Unlined.
Sandals in imitation suede with elasticated heel straps and cork wedge heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2 cm, heel 11.5 cm.
Short, fitted dress with a zip down the front and adjustable straps with metal buckles. Detachable, adjustable belt at the waist and a small front pocket with a flap and press-stud.

Lightly padded parka in a cotton weave with a stand-up collar and detachable, lined hood. Zip and wind flap with concealed press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, and a single back vent. Quilted inner lining.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and legs with seams and narrow hems.
Non-wired bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Short top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a tie-detail at one side of the hem.
Knee-length sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a print motif on one leg. Unlined.
A-line blouse in an airy cotton weave with short raglan sleeves and covered elastication with a small frill trim at the top.
T-shirt in soft cotton with a print motif and sequins.
T-shirt in ribbed, patterned cotton jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline and overlocked edges at the sleeves and hem.
Large shopper in imitation leather with two handles and a concealed magnetic fastener at the top. One zipped inner compartment. Size 13x40x40 cm.
Short-sleeved Best Friend tops in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim approx. 3.5 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline and an open chest pocket.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Metal hoop earrings with different pendants. Diameter from 1.5 cm to 2.5 cm.
Glittery trainers with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with contrasting colour trims. Elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Straight-cut shirt in a cotton weave in a relaxed fit with a turn-down collar, classic front, short sleeves and a rounded hem with slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a round neck. Slightly longer at the back.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with picot trims around the neckline and armholes. Sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.

Suit trousers in a cotton Oxford weave with an extended waistband with adjustable elastication and a concealed fastening, and zip fly and button. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a flap and button and legs with creases.
Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Fitted running top in fast-drying functional fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbed cuffs with thumbholes.
Dungarees in sweatshirt fabric made from soft organic cotton. Straps with press-studs, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Scarf in an airy weave with fringes along the sides.
Sleeveless, cropped top in soft viscose jersey with a V-neck ending in a knot detail at the hem. Slightly shorter at the front.

Coat in woven fabric made from a felted wool blend with a stand-up collar and buttons down the front. Diagonal, welt front pockets, two inner pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.

Set with a vest top and pair of shorts in soft cotton jersey. Vest top with a print motif on the front and shoulder straps with a decorative tie detail. Shorts with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist and a frill trim at the top.

Push-up bra in mesh and jersey with lace details and underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable lace-trimmed shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Long hoodie in supersoft cotton jersey with a brushed finish. Double-layered, drawstring hood, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides.
Straight-style top in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a sheen. 3/4-length balloon sleeves and horizontal-knit trims with a decorative hole pattern around the neckline and cuffs.
Cardigans in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Short parka in washed cotton twill with a brushed, velvety-smooth finish. Stand-up collar, drawstring hood and a zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front. Side pockets with a press-stud, a drawstring at the waist and a press-stud at the cuffs. Slightly longer and rounded at the back. Unlined.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Microfibre briefs with a lined gusset, cutaway coverage with gathered seams and a laser-cut edge at the back.
Bikini top with lightly padded, removable inserts, wide shoulder straps, metal D-rings at the front, wide elastic at the hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Cap in printed twill with an appliqué on the front and adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with long raglan sleeves, a rubber print on the sleeves and back, overlocked seams for optimum comfort and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and side pockets. Legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides, a small text appliqué and ribbing at the hems. Soft brushed inside.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with gathers at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Short flounced sleeves and a narrow elasticated seam with ties at the waist. Partly lined.
Fitted, knee-length dress in a fine, rib-knit cotton and viscose blend. Collar, a V-shaped opening with decorative buttons at the front and long sleeves.
Top in satin with lace details, a V-neck and narrow shoulder straps.
Short-sleeved tops in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a round, scallop-trimmed neckline.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.
Jacket in soft pile with an embroidered motif at the top, jersey-lined hood and zip down the front. Front pockets with an embroidered motif, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Regular fit.
T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Cardigan in a soft, fine, patterned knit with long sleeves and no buttons.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, an open back pocket and raw, roll-edge hems.
Jacket in lightweight stretch twill with a collar, press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets with a press-stud, and a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined.
Soft, cable-knit slippers with a decorative bow and pompoms at the front. Faux fur linings and insoles. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Straight tunic in denim made from Tencel™ lyocell with a V-neck, pin-tucks around the neckline and armholes, and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides.
V-neck top in woven fabric with spaghetti shoulder straps.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bell-shaped skirt in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist. Unlined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit merino wool with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trainers with a lightly padded edge and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Long, sleeveless dress in viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Long T-shirt in hard-washed slub cotton jersey with raw, roll edges and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, and concealed double-breasted fastening at the front. Jetted front pockets and a flare to the hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder.
